channel.title: Tech Stack on
channel.description: Recent content in Tech Stack on

item.title: Tech Stack
item.description: Speech Recognition Engines # Dictation: web speech API Transcription: server side powered by Google’s / Microsoft’s speech to text engines. Hosting # Hosted on Google Cloud App technology # The app itself is built on JavaScript, using npm. The code behind it is not open source. We are open sourcing the wrapper javascript library around the web speech API. Site technology # The website around the app, landing page, docs, etc.
